records.where_clear: Airport waiting area in Greece during a pre-departure phase of a joint return operation.
records.location_text_raw: Greece, waiting area of the airport
records.uncertainty_note: Specific airport not identified, only 'airport in Greece'.
records.context_note: During a joint return operation to Georgia and Pakistan, unidentified officers were present in the airport waiting area during the pre-departure phase, which was not in line with procedures and caused concerns among returnees and staff. Additionally, a flight was not authorized to land, causing delays.
records.evidence_quote: As reported by the Frontex Representative on board deployed on this operation, during the pre-departure phase, [redacted] officers [redacted] were present in the waiting area of the airport, guarding the returnees, and looking on the implementation of the pre-departure operations.
